messages.subject: Gameboy advance
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/11/02 1:37:44 PM Central Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes: My two experts (age 9 and 12) said Gameboy advance rocks
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/11/02 1:37:44 PM Central Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

My two experts (age 9 and 12) said Gameboy advance rocks on the other
versions.
Trevor says the Zelda games are great, but harder for young children.
They both said Kirby Dreamland and Dreamland 2 are fun and easier. Don't
get ANY of the DragonballZ games, they "totally suck" according to them.
Golden Sun is highly recommended, but Trevor says for 8 or older most likely.
Castlevania is easier and fun too. Trevor adds "if they get nightmares from
somewhat creepy stuff they probably shouldn't have that one." (skeletons,
gore etc....)
So there's the advice from my gamers....


Ren
Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
And remember,
"A life lived in fear is a life half lived"
